desc: Hats and Apparel for Havasu Crew and Havasu State of Mind. We use and promote boating products as a lifestyle. We are patriotic and love all things American.

layout.text: Thank you to all the Havasu Crew members, both lifers and new members! You all made our event one we will never forget!
If you missed out on the event, click on our catalog button above for your chance at some of the gear we have left.
